page.title: 18St.Lukes Church Matfield
page.content: {St.Lukes Anglican Church,built in {1876,is of Gothic design.}Matfield shares a Priest in Charge with Lamberhurst, and he is assisted by a lay preacher and 2 church wardens. There are 142 on the church electoral roll. Mothers Union,held once a month jointly with Brenchley,has 26 members. Sunday School's 40 children and 6 leaders meet every 2nd.and 4th.Sunday. A Baptism Visitor keeps in touch with children for 5 years after Baptism. Other Church activities are Meeting Point,Bible Study and an outreach planning group.The choir is full and active with 20 members. The church is connected with 2 local schools, Brenchley & Matfield primary and Bennet Memorial Girls secondary. Members of the congregation tend the churchyard, with an area for cremated remains, and adjacent{War Memorial.
